description: Detects  when a firewall rule is modified or deleted in Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
false_positives: Firewall rules being modified or deleted may be performed by a system administrator. Verify that the firewall configuration change was expected.
Exceptions can be added to this rule to filter expected behavior.
name: Google Cloud Firewall Modified or Deleted
query: gcp.audit.method_name:(v*.Compute.Firewalls.Delete OR v*.Compute.Firewalls.Patch OR v*.Compute.Firewalls.Update OR v*.Compute.Firewalls.Insert)
author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
